definition: to become visible/to appear/to manifest one's true nature
Observations on the Current State of Officialdom, late Qing novel by Li Baojia 李寶嘉|李宝嘉[Li3 Bao3 jia4]

sentences.english: Fuxin Mongolian drama has a unique form of expression and the cultural charm.
sentences.chinese: 阜新蒙古剧有着独特的表现形式和文化魅力。

sentences.english: This form of animation produced mainly by two-dimensional platform to complete.
sentences.chinese: 本动画表现形式主要是通过二维制作平台来完成。

sentences.english: Trouble is only opportunity in work clothes. ----Henry J. Kaise.
sentences.chinese: 困难只是机遇的另一种表现形式。

sentences.english: Craze is an important form of polymer damage.
sentences.chinese: 银纹是高聚物损伤的重要表现形式。

sentences.english: Emotional pulse and burning of imagination only means external manifestations of the desire.
sentences.chinese: 情感的冲动，想象的燃烧，只是欲望的外在表现形式。

sentences.english: The three chapter: display forms and application principles of overlap of law norms.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分法规竞合的表现形式和处断原则。

sentences.english: Nominalization is the major realization of the ideational grammatical metaphor in opinion columns.
sentences.chinese: 评论专栏中的概念语法隐喻以名物化为主要表现形式。

sentences.english: Mathematics way is the manifestation of mathematics thought.
sentences.chinese: 数学化是数学思维的表现形式。

sentences.english: The forms of nonlinearity mode of thinking.
sentences.chinese: 非线性思维方式的表现形式。

sentences.english: A false Friend and a Shadow, attend only while the Sun shines.
sentences.chinese: 虚伪的朋友与阴影，只在光芒耀眼时现形。

sentences.english: Dou tea is the highest expression of ancient tea art form.
sentences.chinese: 斗茶是古代品茶艺术的最高表现形式。

sentences.english: In different time-space, life has particular manifestations of its own.
sentences.chinese: 生命在不同的时空都有其特殊的表现形式。

sentences.english: Lines in Chinese painting is a kind of artistic expression with eastern artistic characters.
sentences.chinese: 中国画的线是一种富于东方艺术特质的艺术表现形式。

sentences.english: Writing books is a form signifying the establishment of a scholar's own theoretical system.
sentences.chinese: 著书立说是学者们形成自己理论体系的一个表现形式。

sentences.english: This is another appearence of slate flow deformation and failures anisotropy.
sentences.chinese: 这是板岩流动变形破坏各向异性的另一种表现形式。

definition: to show one's true nature (derog.)/to betray oneself
the real body (of Buddha or a God)/true effigy
to vanish/to hide/to cover one's traces
to escape without trace (idiom); to make one's getaway (from the scene of a crime)/to show a clean pair of heels
original shape/true appearance (under the disguise)/true character
